name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I leverage **Python**, **Docker**, and **CI/CD** practices to build high-performance solutions within the healthcare and financial sectors. My extensive technical expertise includes automation and verification, ensuring robust application performance through a strong foundation in **Linux**, **GitLab CI**, and **Jenkins**. I am proficient in utilizing **Allure**, **Grafana**, and **Kibana** for monitoring and observability, enabling data-driven decisions and efficient troubleshooting.
Beyond my technical capabilities, I excel in problem-solving and communication, coupled with critical thinking and interpersonal skills, essential for leading collaborative projects. I have successfully led the development of enterprise-grade platforms incorporating AI/ML capabilities, enhancing predictive analytics and intelligent automation. My dedication to maintaining compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS ensures that my solutions are not only innovative but also secure and reliable.
